definitions: a system of society or government ruled by a woman or women

examples.text: a matriarchy run by morally superior women
feminism has revived an interest in matriarchy

shortDefinitions: system of society or government ruled by woman

definitions: a form of social organization in which descent and relationship are reckoned through the female line.
shortDefinitions: form of social organization in which descent and relationship are reckoned through female line

definitions: the state of being an older, powerful woman in a family or group

examples.text: she cherished a dream of matriarchy—catered to by grandchildren

shortDefinitions: state of being older, powerful woman
